title: The Cool Post
content:
There's only one man I've ever called a coward, and that's Brian Doyle Murray. No, what I'm calling you is a television actor. No! I was ashamed to be SEEN with you. I like being with you. Really? Did nothing cancel? It's called 'taking advantage.' It's what gets you ahead in life. As you may or may not know, Lindsay and I have hit a bit of a rough patch. That's why you always leave a note! I don't understand the question, and I won't respond to it.

I don't understand the question, and I won't respond to it. Across from where? I've opened a door here that I regret. But I bought a yearbook ad from you, doesn't that mean anything anymore?
